description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=2/3, Mature Content=3/3. This is the last game of the Decay series. With multiple endings, it's up to the player how the story will end. Unlock all the extras and get your personal code for the new soundtrack.
description.short: This is the last game of the Decay series. With multiple endings, it's up to the player how the story will end. Unlock all the extras and get your personal code for the new soundtrack.
